snippet: Snowdonia, on 32 Street, caters to the growing population of creative types who have moved to the area known in certain circles as Actoria.
abstract: Neighborhood Joint column on Snowdonia, cozy corner pub in Astoria that offers late happy hour geared toward those who work in service or entertainment industries.
lead_paragraph: Snowdonia, on 32 Street, caters to the growing population of creative types who have moved to the area known in certain circles as Actoria.

headline.main: A Place to Go After the Curtain Falls
